metadata.title: CVE-2024-10396 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An authenticated user can provide a malformed ACL to the fileserver'sStoreACLRPC, causing the fileserver to crash, possibly expose uninitialized memory,andpossibly store garbage data in the audit log.Malformed ACLs provided in responses to client FetchACL RPCs can causeclientprocesses to crash and possibly expose uninitialized memory into other ACLsstored on the server.

criterions.comment: openafs package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
